name: Valletta 3 Seater with Chaise - Mystique Heritage
description: Elevated comfort meets timeless elegance in the Valletta 3 Seater with Chaise — a luxurious modular lounge designed for modern living with classic taste. Upholstered in luminous heritage green velvet, this statement piece brings a rich, textural warmth to your home while offering the flexibility of customisable configuration. Deep, plush cushions filled with high-density foam, a spring support system, and solid European beech wood legs combine to deliver next-level lounging without compromising on style. Each modular section features refined tufted detailing, allowing you to rearrange and expand your seating as your space or lifestyle evolves.

name: Florabelle 4 Seater Sofa - Vanilla
description: With its graceful, sweeping curves, the Florabelle 4 Seater Sofa embodies modern design. Draped in a heavenly soft plush white fabric, with vertical channel tufting, along with high density foam seating on a spring base, Florabelle promises to envelop you in stylish luxury and dial up your living room aesthetic.

name: Florabelle 4 Seater Sofa - Vanilla
description: With its graceful, sweeping curves, the Florabelle 4 Seater Sofa embodies modern design. Draped in a heavenly soft plush white fabric, with vertical channel tufting, along with high density foam seating on a spring base, Florabelle promises to envelop you in stylish luxury and dial up your living room aesthetic.

name: Blaire 3 Seater RHS Chaise Lounge - Mushroom
description: The Blaire 3 Seater Chaise Lounge boasts contemporary chic design with its sleek curved form, adding sophistication and modern flair to your living space. Enjoy the perfect balance of elegance and durability, thanks to the two-toned interwoven fabric. The beautifully curved arms enhance the aesthetic appeal but also provide comfort and support, inviting you to unwind in style. Mounted on metal legs with a sprung base.

name: Berlin Dining Chair - White Boucle
description: Meet the Berlin Dining Chair — effortlessly chic, endlessly versatile, and made for modern living. Wrapped in soft white boucle, with a gently curved back and generously padded seat, it’s the kind of piece that feels just as good as it looks. Placed in a pared-back dining space or styled solo as a statement accent in the bedroom or living room, the Berlin will look right at home. Whether you're hosting dinner or lounging with a book, it’s comfort and style in equal measure — and a quiet favourite for design lovers who appreciate those little details.

name: Geneva Dining Chair
description: Meet the Geneva Dining Chair  where sculptural elegance meets natural warmth. With its gently arched backrest, light elm timber frame, and beautifully handwoven paper rope seat and back, Geneva is a masterclass in understated style. Effortlessly blending Scandinavian simplicity with mid-century curves and a modern organic feel. A timeless piece with soul, texture, and quiet sophistication.

name: Aspen Dining Chair
description: Elevate your dining space with the Aspen Dining Chair, where modern organic style meets everyday functionality. Designed with a curved wishbone-style back and a soft beige vegan leather seat, Aspen brings comfort and craftsmanship together in perfect harmony. The solid elmwood frame adds a warm, natural touch that pairs beautifully with contemporary and coastal interiors alike.

name: Leilani Chair - Salt
description: Adorned in a natural multi-toned tweed fabric, the gentle curvature of the Leilani Chair softens angular dining spaces, providing a comforting embrace for back and arms.

name: Blair Bed
description: The Blair Bed is the epitome of sophistication, the ideal choice to enhance the elegance of your bedroom. The statement winged headboard adds timeless beauty to your décor while providing a supportive backdrop for your bed. Wrapped in an elegant neutral-toned fabric, the Blair will complement various interior styles.

name: Allure Bed with Drawers - Natural
description: Make your bedroom truly alluring and inviting with the Allure Bed in Natural. Upholstered in a neutral fabric in a tweed-like texture, this stunning piece features a statement vertical panel headboard that oozes grandeur, and practical underbed storage.

name: Zaha Bench Seat
description: Enrich your bedroom or living space with the luxurious Zaha Bench Seat, upholstered in stunning chocolate brown velvet. The gently moulded legs form effortlessly into the seat, creating an elegant and captivating design.

name: Iris Bed
description: With its padded headboard and soft gentle curves, the Iris Bed is an on-trend piece that also exudes timeless luxury. Enveloped in soft velvet, pair it with a wide range of bedding, throw pillows, and accessories to create your own unique look.

name: Blair Bed
description: The Blair Bed is the epitome of sophistication, the ideal choice to enhance the elegance of your bedroom. The statement winged headboard adds timeless beauty to your décor while providing a supportive backdrop for your bed. Wrapped in an elegant neutral-toned fabric, the Blair will complement various interior styles.

name: Zaha Bench Seat
description: Enrich your bedroom or living space with the luxurious Zaha Bench Seat, upholstered in stunning chocolate brown velvet. The gently moulded legs form effortlessly into the seat, creating an elegant and captivating design.

name: Remarkable Rug - Pure White
description: Crafted from 80% eco-friendly wool and 20% cotton, the Remarkable Rug embodies modern comfort with a conscious heart. Handwoven in India by skilled artisans, each piece celebrates time-honoured craftsmanship and sustainable design. The flat-woven construction enhances its artisanal character and exceptional durability—perfect for contemporary living spaces. A truly timeless rug that balances beauty, texture, and purpose.

name: Uplifting - Textured Canvas with Dune Floater
description: Featuring textured swirling patterns in calming blue and green tones, this modern art piece brings a sense of movement and tranquility to your space. Painted on canvas and framed in a sleek floating frame, it effortlessly combines contemporary style with a serene, artistic flair.

name: James Floor Mirror - Walnut
description: Make a chic and timeless statement with the James Floor Mirror — a striking two-metre tall arched silhouette crafted from solid birch wood. Finished in a warm walnut stain, this full-length mirror brings elegance and a sense of space to any room, whether styled in a bedroom, living area, or long hallway. Its clean arc design nods to both classic and contemporary interiors, offering versatility and enduring appeal. Lean it casually against the wall or position it with intention — either way, the James Mirror reflects both light and effortless style.

name: Fonteyn Chandelier - Medium
description: The Fonteyn Medium Chandelier features charcoal cut glass and antique brass finishes.  Striking the perfect combination of warmth, moodiness and chic stylish appeal.

name: Verna Drinks Trolley
description: Channel some Gatsby in your dining room with this stunning art-deco style drinks trolley, finished in antique bronze for a glam look.
